getClassOrInterfaceDeclaration

protected static final net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.ast.ASTClassOrInterfaceDeclaration getClassOrInterfaceDeclaration(net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.ast.AbstractJavaNode node)

isInterfaceImplemented

protected static final boolean isInterfaceImplemented(net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.ast.AbstractJavaNode node,
                                                      Class<?> iface)
Returns true if the given AST node or its first ClassOrInterfaceDeclaration parent node implements the given interface or extends the given class.
If there is no such parent node, or if the ClassOrInterfaceDeclaration node does not contain Java type information (PMD type resolution must be enabled), false is returned.

Parameters:
node - AST node to check.
iface - Interface or base class to check for being implemented by the node, if a ClassOrInterfaceDeclaration, or by the first AST parent of that node type.
Returns:
true if the node or its parent type declaration declares a type implementing the given interface, false otherwise.

isUtilClass

protected static final boolean isUtilClass(Class<?> clazz)
Returns true if and only if the given class fulfills the following criteria:
  • All public methods are static
  • The constructor is not visible (package-private or private)

Parameters:
clazz - Class to check for util class structure
Returns:
true if the class matches the util class criteria, false otherwise.
